title: My ranked placements
body: Okay so last season I was silver 4 and I'm currently in my placements, about to play my last game.. Im 5-4, If I win my next game what league do i go into? and if I lose what rank.... I don't really know but apparently if I win i get silver 4 and lose i get silver 5 :p

replies.body: okay I won and i got fucking bronze 3 lmao brb kms
Yup exactly what I got. Silver 4 last season, 6-4 in placements this season, Bronze 3.

I was Silver V at the end of last season, went 7-3 in my placements and got Silver IV. (i'm Plat V now btw)

Depends what order your wins/losses come in and also you are pretty much required to do really well in order to hold your division.

You can roughly guess where you will be placed when you look at the rank of your opponents and teammates.

In your placement games you lost the games against Silver V's and won the games with Bronze IV's and III's. You can't really afford to lose your Silver level MMR games when doing placements. But hey, if you're a Silver player, Bronze should be easy as Pie to 1v5 carry
Yeah im in silver promos now :pp
